org.forgerock.openidm.config.installer

Class DelayedConfigHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.config.installer.DelayedConfigHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProviderListener

    public class DelayedConfigHandler
extends Object
implements ProviderListener
    Handles configuration that needs to wait for related meta-data to become available (e.g. for encryption) before it can be provided to OSGi
